entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:56 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -19.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -19.5°C
Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -25.8°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
